title: Top 5 Supplements | Health Connection Family Chiropractic
author: Inception2
description: Top Minnetonka Chiropractor Kyle LeDuc of Health Connection Family Chiropractic provides the top 5 supplements.
cleaned_text: Top 5 Supplements in Minnetonka Top 5 Supplements in Minnetonka Omega 3 Fish Oil - Omega 3 fatty acids are crucial building block that your body cannot form naturally. It helps improve mental, cardiovascular and immune health - Take 2,000mg - 3,000mg of fish oil daily Multivitamin - A quality multivitamin is essential to ensure you're getting all the nutrients that you may be missing from your diet Probiotics - Having a healthy gut microbiome is crucial for all aspects of health - Find a probiotic that has at least 5 different bacteria strains with at least 1 Billion CFU per strain Vitamin D - Vitamin D is arguably one of the most important vitamins that should be supplemented. It has been found to improve immune health, mental health and may even help fight against cancer! - Dose 1,000 - 5,000 IU Daily Magnesium - Magnesium is an important micronutrient that many people are naturally deficient in. - Dose 100mg - 200mg as needed Monday 9:00am 12:00pm
